full_summary:
### Solicitation Details
#### Tender Title
* EMC Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support for DND
* Maintenance et Support Matériel et Logiciel EMC pour le MDN

#### Solicitation ID
* Solicitation Number (numéro de sollicitation): SSC-22-00020798:T
* Amendment Number (numéro de modification): 2

#### Tender Details
* Description: The Department of National Defence (DND) in Ottawa, Ontario is seeking EMC Hardware Maintenance and Support and EMC Software Maintenance and Support.
* Due to the impacts from the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers must submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority's email.

#### Timeline
* Tender Closing Date (date limite de soumission des offres): Monday, December 5, 2022 at 2:00 p.m. EST.
* Amendment Date (date de modification): December 2, 2022

#### Selection Criteria
Decision will be based on the lowest evaluated price.

#### Trade Agreements
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

The original entry has been rephrased, reorganized, and some irrelevant details have been removed. Here is an example of changes made:
Original text: 'the bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances, for the subject bid solicitation.'
 Replaced to: 'Due to the impacts from the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers must submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority's email.'

The rewritten entry aims to improve the clarity and clarity while maintaining the core details about the government tender.
